api_endpoint.reasoning: Most relevant endpoint for creating leave requests in Rippling
api_endpoint.required_structure: Simple flat structure with direct field mappings

employee_external_id.notes: Semantic mapping - both identify the employee/worker making the request. Rippling uses worker_id instead of employee_external_id.

absence_type_external_id.notes: Semantic mapping - both identify the type of absence/leave. Rippling uses leave_type_id instead of absence_type_external_id.

status.notes: Direct mapping - exact field name match with same semantic meaning. Both represent the status of the absence/leave request.

start_date.notes: Direct mapping - exact field name match with same semantic meaning. Both represent the start date of the absence/leave request.

end_date.notes: Direct mapping - exact field name match with same semantic meaning. Both represent the end date of the absence/leave request.

start_half_day.notes: Direct mapping - exact field name match with same semantic meaning. Both represent whether the start date is a half day.

end_half_day.notes: Direct mapping - exact field name match with same semantic meaning. Both represent whether the end date is a half day.

amount.notes: Direct mapping - exact field name match with same semantic meaning. Both represent the amount of time off requested.

unit.notes: Direct mapping - exact field name match with same semantic meaning. Both represent the unit of time for the amount.

employee_note.notes: Direct mapping - exact field name match with same semantic meaning. Both represent the employee's note about the request.

required_conversions.conversion_method: Map to worker_id field - semantic mapping
Map to leave_type_id field - semantic mapping

missing_fields_handling: All fields are mappable - no missing fields
validation_requirements: All fields are required in API request
worker_id must be valid worker ID in system
leave_type_id must be valid leave type ID in system
Date fields must be in proper format
business_logic_considerations: Perfect field mapping with semantic consistency
All fields must be present for successful request
